mapper.insert: INSERT into tb_pro_module(mod_id,mod_name, code, show_px, release_px, version_fix, pro_id, created, updated, operator, is_vaild) VALUES (#{modId},#{modName}, #{code}, #{showPx}, #{releasePx}, #{versionFix}, #{proId}, #{created}, #{updated}, #{operator}, #{isVaild})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_pro_module set mod_name=#{modName} where mod_id=#{modId}
